getUserProfile

public com.sumilux.ssi.client.json.JSONObject getUserProfile()
                                                      throws IdmeException
Get user profile from idme server

Returns:
JSON String key:{userID, salutation, firstName, lastName, displayName, defaultOrg, emails} emails is JSON Array[{"primary": "dummy@dummy.com"},{"secondary": "dummy@dummy.com"}]
Throws:
IdmeException
